comments:
I noticed that when "Build Automatically" is on, the build/index section of the project's context menu get shifted down to the very bottom.  Is this the expected behaviour?

Please see the attached screen shots for details.

Created an attachment (id=70868)
when Build Automatically is on

Created an attachment (id=70869)
when Build Automatically is off

An exception is thrown:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: can't find IDorg.eclipse.ui.BuildAction
	at org.eclipse.jface.action.ContributionManager.insertAfter(ContributionManager.java:327)
	at org.eclipse.jface.action.ContributionManager.insertAfter(ContributionManager.java:318)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.ui.navigator.CNavigatorBuildActionGroup.fillContextMenu(CNavigatorBuildActionGroup.java:114)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.ui.navigator.CNavigatorBuildActionProvider.fillContextMenu(CNavigatorBuildActionProvider.java:73)
	at org.eclipse.ui.navigator.NavigatorActionService.addCommonActionProviderMenu(NavigatorActionService.java:205)
	at org.eclipse.ui.navigator.NavigatorActionService.fillContextMenu(NavigatorActionService.java:172)
[...]
I'll have a look.
